TopicTitle: Game keeps freezing with regular intervals

Articles.Content:
Hi there,

My game keeps freezing (sometimes longer than a minute) with regular intervals in save files where i have multiple crafts launched into orbit. It seems that when i add more components to  new rocket, the occurence seems to become more frequent. If i start a new game and reload the craft that was causing the freezes, all is fine. As soon as I launch more stuff into space, stuff gets buggy. My system has the following specs:

I7 8086k @ 5ghz

Rtx4070ti

16gb ram

1tb NVME ssd (fast)

Could this be a ram issue? Do i need more ram?
